1.title: Why Am I Here?

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

1.plot: Cheryl assesses the state of her career and decides to take action.

2.title: How It All Started

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

2.plot: Fortunately for Cheryl and unfortunately for her mother, she always knew what she wanted to do.

3.title: Broadway Didn't Want Me

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

3.plot: With an original song and dance number, Cheryl reminisces on how Broadway didn't want her and what made her move to Hollywood.

4.title: It Was LIKE Christopher Guest

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

4.plot: Some directors don't understand the difference between quality and - well, some directors just don't understand quality.

5.title: Meeting an Agent

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

5.plot: Cheryl does her best to grin and bear it through several agent meetings until she finds the perfect match.

6.title: Casting Director Workshops

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

6.plot: Casting workshops can be really resourceful - or they be something entirely different.

7.title: Waiting at an Audition

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

7.plot: Some crazy thoughts can run through an actor's mind while waiting at an audition - especially when you can hear what's happening in the room.

8.title: Hollywood Myth

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

8.plot: A few interesting stories float around Hollywood that would certainly imply that things are not always as they seem.

9.title: Psychics

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

9.plot: Cheryl gets bamboozled by the maverick of all psychics.

10.title: The Jealousy Factor

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

10.plot: Jealousy runs rampant in any industry; but perhaps just a little bit more in the entertainment industry.

11.title: The Big Agent

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

11.plot: The bigger the agent, the more ironic they are.

12.title: If I Only Had a Name

episode of.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

12.plot: Who hasn't fantasized how easy life would be if they were only "a name."

imdb.plot outline: Scheming agents, sketchy directors, and cringe-worthy auditions are only the beginning of actress Cheryl Texiera's hilarious journey in pursuit of her dream. Loosely based on her real-life experiences, Cheryl shares a very tongue-in-cheek point of view on the state of today's entertainment industry with her witty dialogue, Broadway/Vaudeville song and dance numbers, and an array of colorful characters you won't soon forget.
imdb.title: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress
akas: Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress (United States)
plot: Scheming agents, sketchy directors, and cringe-worthy auditions are only the beginning of actress Cheryl Texiera's hilarious journey in pursuit of her dream. Loosely based on her real-life experiences, Cheryl shares a very tongue-in-cheek point of view on the state of today's entertainment industry with her witty dialogue, Broadway/Vaudeville song and dance numbers, and an array of colorful characters you won't soon forget.::Anonymous

She sings, she dances, she acts - but she can't get cast. Unabashed, unapologetic, and unquestionably hilarious, _Confessions of a Bitter(sweet) Actress_ (qv) takes its audience on a journey inside Cheryl Texiera's world as she navigates the ironically tumultuous waters of the very-fickle entertainment industry.::Anonymous
